text: Rero mugihe yibaruka yaciye avuga ati:- Muremyi wanje, jewe nibarutse ikibondo c’umwana w’umukobwa, n’Imana niyo ifise ubumenyi buhagije bw’ukumenya ico kibondo yibarutse, n’umwana w’umuhungu ntameze nk’umwana w’umwigeme nanje ndamuhaye izina rya Mariyamu (iii) kandi nanje ndamukingiye kuri wewe haba we n’uruvyaro rwiwe na Shetani yatawe kure mumigisha yawe
